CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( REDU_Grade_Override__c ) ) ), TEXT( REDU_Grade_Override__c ), IF(ISPICKVAL(hed__Course_Offering__r.hed__Course__r.rio_ed__Grade_Type__c ,"Score"),TEXT( MFLOOR(hed__Numerical_Grade__c)), hed__Letter_Grade__c)) & " (" & IF( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( REDU_Call_Override__c ) ) ), IF(TEXT( REDU_Call_Override__c ) = "Ordinary", "Ord", "ExOrd") , TEXT( hed__Term_Grade_Type__c ) ) & ")"
CustomField.label: Grade
